tabs.default:
This page consist of entries of Legendary beings.


- [[Marcus Romulo]] - The Lone Warrior, White God
- [[Marcus of Miletus]] - The Mad Scholar, Father of Mirdum
- [[Artoria]] - Godslayer and Saviour of Mortal-kind, Creator of the Eternal Tower
- [[Euphemia]] - Conquerer of Loreteia, Wielder of the Ordinary Quill
- [[Kyrea]] - Leviathan Eater, She who predates on Leviathans
